game_description: At the end of his journey with the wolf goddess Holo, former traveling merchant Lawrence settled down with her and opened a bathhouse. The couple was blessed with an adorable daughter and an idyllic life. However, the beautiful wolves have a weakness for delicious meals and their food expenses are a source of headaches for Lawrence. One day, as Lawrence is going about his fur side business to further fill the family's coffers, a slight incident occurs. To further complicate things, Holo saunters in with quite the feast. This is a VR Animation of Spice and Wolf: Spring Log, sequel to the original Spice and Wolf VR animation. The game has a 30 minute story and a game mode where you can watch part of the anime alongside its characters in the style of Japanese paper street theater. A peaceful life in the bathhouse with wolfgirls awaits.
review_1: Best anime game on VR!! Even tho it is short, I keep coming back just to pause and look at the visuals. This is the only game I do not regret buying on VR. I hope they make more games like this in the future.
review_2: I am a fan of the novels and the anime, and now I am also a fan of this game. Loved it, well deserved 5 stars. I hope they make a S&W VR 3 or add more content to this one, I'm looking forward to it.
